name: Classic Fencing [DEMO]
description:
Classic fencing version BETA.09  

created by SCF (Updated 8/21/2021)

Basic info:

Classic fencing game, by using most rules from foil fencing. It is 2d-action fighting between 2 players. A player who hit the enemy first gets the point. Use your speed, aptitude, touch to win enemy in a few seconds

The game supports both single/multiplayer, you can play with bots, 2 players on a screen, and you can even play online multiplayer with a capacity of 10 players per room.

Even more, the game is still in development, so you can submit your comments and ideas too. If you played and like it, you can help me by contributing.

Play modes.

- "Offline" the player who got 8 points first wins, but just restart the round with 0:0 score

- "Online" needed at least 2 players to start a dual. The loser will be on the last queue, winner stays. Fight until you lose (8 point first wins).

** note: now online server only allows for 20 players. If you want to expand server size, you can contribute  **

How to control:

Basic rules:

- The one who hit the enemy first wins (Look at the centerboard lights to see who hit first)

- When a player steps out from the stage, -1 point

- The one who gets 8 points first wins

- When players hit each other at the same time, see more in {Advance rules}

Advance rules

- When players hit each other at the same time, the system will decide the winner from "Attack right

- We can see which player is having "Attack right" at the top of the screen (green ball)

- Player who steps forward first will get "Attack right"

- Player can lose "Attack right" by doing these actions

       1.Stay still over 0.75 sec

       2.Enemy parried the player's attack

       3.Missed attack/parry

- Player who doesn't have "Attack right" can get "Attack right" by doing these actions

       1.Parry enemy's attack

       2.Dodge successfully
